TopicTitle: 1.25m cargo bay incorrectly "blocking" one of my two radial attached parachutes.

Articles.Content:
Strange bug, I attached a small cargo bay to the bottom of a command pod, attached two radial parachutes to the command pod. And when it came to the point where I needed the chutes, only 1 of the chutes fired. The other was "in the cargobay" according to the game. Opening the bay allowed me to fire the other chute.

I've uploaded the craft here for reference:

http://daid.eu/~daid/ToErr.craft
